name: POLYFORCE
description:
Embody small monsters pulled by the universe of pop culture and fight in environments inspired by your favorite movies.

Charge at your rival and be the first to bring down the other of the platform.

Will you be spammer or strategist? Stay aware of your power bar to use your full powers.

In the forest of Stranger Things or on the Ghostbuster's car, take part of the fight, but don't be affraid by the monsters...
